description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0562 ( Processing Consideration Codes)
name: v2.0562

text.div:
Processing Consideration Codes

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
DFADJ Deferred Adjudication ProcessingIf permitted by Payeradded v2.6
EFORM Electronic form to followE30 transaction to followadded v2.6
FAX Fax to followadded v2.6
PAPER Paper documentation to followadded v2.6
PYRDELAY Delayed by a Previous PayerAllows Provider to explain lateness of Invoice to a subsequent Payeradded v2.6
RTADJ Real Time Adjudication ProcessingIf permitted by Payeradded v2.6

title: v2 Processing Consideration Codes
